author: greenmedinfo
title: Melatonin supplementation improves N-terminal pro-B-type natriuretic peptide levels and quality of life in patients with heart failure.
text:
[Melatonin supplementation improves N-terminal pro-B-type natriuretic peptide levels and quality of life in patients with heart failure.](/article/melatonin-supplementation-improves-n-terminal-pro-b-type-natriuretic-peptide-l)
Melatonin supplementation improves N-terminal pro-B-type natriuretic peptide levels and quality of life in patients with heart failure with reduced ejection fraction: Results from MeHR trial, a randomized clinical trial.
Clin Cardiol. 2022 Apr ;45(4):417-426. Epub 2022 Feb 16. PMID:
35170783
Shervin G Hoseini
BACKGROUND: Melatonin, the major secretion of the pineal gland, has beneficial effects on the cardiovascular system and might advantage heart failure with reduced ejection fraction (HFrEF) by attenuating the effects of the renin-angiotensin-aldosterone and sympathetic system on the heart besides its antioxidant and anti-inflammatory effects.
HYPOTHESIS: We hypothesized that oral melatonin might improve echocardiographic parameters, serum biomarkers, and a composite clinical outcome (including quality of life, hospitalization, and mortality) in patients with HFrEF.
METHODS: A placebo-controlled double-blinded randomized clinical trial was conducted on patients with stable HFrEF. The intervention was 10 mg melatonin or placebo tablets administered every night for 24 weeks. Echocardiography and measurements of N-terminal pro-B-type natriuretic peptide (NT-Pro BNP), high-sensitivity C-reactive protein, lipid profile, and psychological parameters were done at baseline and after 24 weeks.
RESULTS: Overall, 92 patients were recruited, and 85 completed the study (melatonin: 42, placebo: 43). Serum NT-Pro BNP decreased significantly in the melatonin compared with the placebo group (estimated marginal means for difference [95% confidence interval]: 111.0 [6.2-215.7], p = .044). Moreover, the melatonin group had a significantly better clinical outcome (0.93 [0.18-1.69], p = .017), quality of life (5.8 [0.9-12.5], p = .037), and New York Heart Association class (odds ratio: 12.9 [1.6-102.4]; p = .015) at the end of the trial. Other studied outcomes were not significantly different between groups.
CONCLUSIONS: Oral melatonin decreased NT-Pro BNP and improved the quality of life in patients with HFrEF. Thus it might be a beneficial supplement in HFrEF.
 [Heart Failure : CK(1240) : AC(183)](/disease/heart-failure) [Cardioprotective : CK(5377) : AC(1675)](/pharmacological-action/cardioprotective)

author: CodexIT
title: Continues to enhance its patient-centric technolog
text:
Continues to enhance its patient-centric technology support and service capabilities
COLUMBUS, Ohio , Oct. 17, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- CodexIT, a national leader in healthcare technology solutions, managed services, clinical consulting, and analytics, just announced the acquisition of Marsden's Kyval, a data migration, validation, and archiving company based in New York City . CodexIT's CEO, Wes Strickling , and Kyval's founder and owner, Randy Marsden , worked to bring the two organizations together.
This strategic acquisition is the fourth for CodexIT in the last two years. It will allow them to continue to scale and grow their professional and clinical services division by adding data services to the portfolio. This also will continue to solidify CodexIT as the partner of choice for healthcare groups with a focus on patient-centric technology and clinical solutions.
"We are thrilled to welcome Marsden's Kyval team into the CodexIT family," said Strickling. "This acquisition allows us to offer even more robust IT solutions, ensuring that healthcare organizations can securely and efficiently manage their data as they transition and adapt to new clinical technologies. Kyval's unique capabilities in data migration, validation, and archiving will complement our existing offerings, making CodexIT the go-to partner for all healthcare IT needs."
"Healthcare data migration is a rapidly growing business due to the industry's rapid shift in improved EHR technology to keep up with ever-changing regulations on access to health data," said Marsden. "Our specialty-focused method fits perfectly into CodexIT's portfolio, and they have the resources needed to keep up with demand."
About Kyval
Kyval is a tech-enabled specialty-focused healthcare data company, providing migration services and cloud-based archiving software for thousands of doctors nationwide.
About CodexIT
For more than 20 years, CodexIT has been committed to helping healthcare organizations leverage technology to optimize patient care and deliver better patient outcomes. CodexIT is more than a technology vendor, we are an extension of our clients' staff, from the Exam Lane to the C-Suite. Headquartered in Columbus, Ohio , with service centers in North Carolina , New Hampshire , Michigan , South Carolina , Utah , Minnesota , and now NYC. Codex is one of the leading healthcare IT providers. To learn more visit: https://codex-it.com/ .
Media Contact: Melissa Howard [email protected] 614.540.5520 codex-it.com
SOURCE CodexIT

author: Gopi
title: Misleading claims on Mahakumbh an affront to 56 crore devotees: CM Yogi in UP Assembly
text:
Lucknow, Feb 19 (SocialNews.XYZ) Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath on Wednesday hit out at the opposition Samajwadi Party (SP) over its alleged attempts to defame the ongoing Mahakumbh in Prayagraj with baseless and misleading claims.
Addressing the Uttar Pradesh Assembly on the second day, Yogi Adityanath delivered a sharp rebuttal to the Opposition's allegations surrounding Mahakumbh and said that it was not a government or party event but rather a celebration of society.
The Chief Minister emphasised that while the House was engaged in discussion, more than 56.25 crore devotees had taken a dip at the sacred Triveni Sangam.
He criticised the Opposition's alleged attempts to spread rumours with misleading videos targeting Sanatan Dharma, Ganga, the Hindu faith and the Mahakumbh.
"Such actions are not just an attack on Sanatan beliefs but a direct affront to the faith of 56 crore devotees and the spiritual essence of India itself," CM Yogi remarked in the House.
He further stated: "The Mahakumbh is not an event tied to any particular party or government but a grand celebration of society."
The government's role, he emphasised, is that of a humble facilitator, dedicated to fulfilling its responsibilities with the utmost sincerity.
"We see ourselves as servants entrusted with this duty and will discharge it with complete commitment. Our deep reverence for India’s eternal traditions makes it our responsibility to honor and uphold them," he said.
Calling it a privilege for the government to be associated with the Mahakumbh of the century, the Chief Minister highlighted how, despite all the negative propaganda, the nation and the world embraced the event, elevating it to unprecedented success.
The Chief Minister also acknowledged Assembly member Manoj Pandey's efforts to bring up the issue of misinformation.
He pointed out how deliberate attempts were made to spread rumors by falsely linking accidents in Cairo, Nepal, Jharkhand, and other places to Mahakumbh, and questioned the motives of those responsible for such misleading narratives.
He also took a jibe at the Leader of Opposition in the House and said: "I do not mock your opposition because I understand your habit."
"It is widely believed that today's 'Samajwadis' betray the very system that sustains them," he further quipped.
Source: IANS
About Gopi
Gopi Adusumilli is a Programmer. He is the editor of SocialNews.XYZ and President of AGK Fire Inc.
He enjoys designing websites, developing mobile applications and publishing news articles on current events from various authenticated news sources.
When it comes to writing he likes to write about current world politics and Indian Movies. His future plans include developing SocialNews.XYZ into a News website that has no bias or judgment towards any.
He can be reached at gopi@socialnews.xyz

author: Redacción Judicial
title: Adulta mayor murió mientras dos ladrones robaban su casa
text:
Las autoridades están tras la pista de los delincuentes, quienes fueron captadas por cámaras de seguridad del sector.
Hay dolor e indignación en la localidad de Bosa, en Bogotá, luego de conocerse la muerte violenta de una mujer, de 82 años, a manos de un par de ladrones. El atroz crimen ocurrió a plena luz del día.
Hasta la carrera 89A con calle 50B Sur del barrio Villa de los Comuneros llegaron dos delincuentes, el momento quedó registrado en cámaras de seguridad el sector. Justo a las 2:00 p.m., los sujetos se acercaron a una vivienda y forcejearon la puerta para poder ingresar.
Lea también: Niña de 8 años murió en enfrentamiento de policías y manifestantes
Los ladrones, al parecer, estaban confiado que la casa estaba sola. Sin embargo, al ingresar se encontraron con la adulta mayor, a quien ultrajaron y amordazaron.
Según versiones de las autoridades, durante varios minutos los sujetos permanecieron en la residencia y tomaron todos los objetos de valor que encontraron a su paso. Mientras el hurto se consumaba, la mujer sufrió un colapso.
“La verdad nadie se dio cuenta de nada. Solo cuando llegó la Policía con varias motos y patrullas fue que supimos que a una de las señoras de esa cuadra la encontraron muerta”, contó a Q’Hubo Bogotá un comerciante de la zona.
Puede leer: Juan Carlos Pérez Arias, el motociclista que murió en grave choque en Bucaramanga
El reporte señala que durante el hurto y debido a la impresión del mismo, la mujer sufrió un paro cardiorrespiratorio que le causó la muerte. Los ladrones no solo se llevaron varios objetos, también acabaron con la vida de una mujer indefensa tras violentar su hogar.
Las autoridades de la localidad junto con el CTI de la Fiscalía iniciaron la búsqueda de los ladrones, quienes lograron escapar minutos antes de que fuera encontrado el cuerpo sin vida en una de las casas de este tranquilo callejón de Bosa, donde hoy la muerte enluta a la comunidad.
Publicidad
Además: Hirió a un hombre a balazos en medio de una discusión: irá 4 años a la cárcel
“En este momento se está por establecer qué se llevaron los sujetos de esta vivienda, ya que todo está en materia de investigación. Se están monitoreando las cámaras de videovigilancia para establecer lo ocurrido en este lugar”, informó el teniente coronel Óscar Cahuta, comandante operativo de la localidad de Bosa.
topics: Crime, Law and Justice->robbery and theft

author: Kaushani Chatterjee
title: “This is absolutely ridiculous!” Chris Russo and Michael Kay SHREDS Jose Siri for slow HR trot against Yankees
text:
“This is absolutely ridiculous!” Chris Russo and Michael Kay SHREDS Jose Siri for slow HR trot against Yankees
Jose Siri’s slow home run job infuriates Yankees dugout as Aaron Judge and Juan Soto taunt 29-year-old by winning in a 9-1 record.
Michael Kay, Jose Siri, Chris Russo [Image Credit: NY Post/Tampa Bay Times/Washington Post]
Tampa Bay Rays outfielder Jose Siri’s slow home run trot infuriated several people including sports commentators Chris Russo, Michael Kay, and Yankees players. While celebrations are often part of the MLB, time, score, and occasion often matter.
In the case of Siri, the Rays were already down 5-0 when his HR lifted up the team record to 5-1. Despite that, the Rays failed to climb back up, going home with a 9-1 loss against the
NY Yankees. Yanks team captain Aaron Judge was visibly upset about Siri taking his sweet time across the field, as captured by Yes Network.
Monday marked Siri’s 14th HR of the season in the fifth inning. Other than taking his time on the run, he also mocked the Yankees fans by ‘chirping’ hand gestures, which further irked the crowd and the Yankees team.
During the game, Michael Kay blasted Jose Siri, saying he should’ve done it if the team was winning. It was not an appropriate time to mock and celebrate his home run, as per him.
You’re losing! Celebrate when you’re winning. They’re acting like it’s Mardi Gras in that dugout. You’re losing the game!Michael Kay as per X.
Michael Kay wasn't a fan of Jose Siri's home run celebration.— Awful Announcing (@awfulannouncing)
"You're losing…I mean, they're acting like it's Mardi Gras in that dugout. You're losing the game!"
[pic.twitter.com/qKkvkXnwQv] [July 22, 2024]
Yankees manager
Aaron Boone also did not see favorably to the action as he commented,
It’s a new world. I look away sometimes…It’s on us, each individuals, to handle themselves how they want.Aaron Boone as per X.
Aaron Judge was staring down Jose Siri after his keep talking celebration— Talkin' Yanks (@TalkinYanks)
[pic.twitter.com/B87hkRWCYn] [July 22, 2024]
Furthermore, during ESPN’s ‘First Take’ appearance, Chris Russo ripped the 29-year-old saying how they were losing the game, but the outfielder still took his time to indulge into the celebration. “I mean this is absolutely ridiculous!” he said.
Yankees players Aaron Judge and Juan Soto reacts to Jose Siri’s HR
New York Yankees captain Aaron Judge and
Juan Soto also had varied reactions to Tampa Bay Rays Jose Siri’s HR celebration. Judge seemed to stare down his opponent all the way throughout his run on the field without blinking even once. In contrast, Soto took the approach of taunting his opponent on the field.
Soto recorded the slowest home run of the competition this year so far,
as per Marca, to outdo Siri’s slow trot performance. Although he said it was due to the hot weather and he wanted to avoid injuries, the fans seemed to have taken it in another way.
I don’t know what (Jose Siri) was doing, actually. I just don’t know. For me, I just – you know, hot weather. Tough day. I tried to save the hammies and make sure I go nice and easy.Juan Soto as per Sam of Marca.
"I don't know what he was doing. For me, hot weather, tough day, try to save the hammies" – Juan Soto on his home run trot in possible response to Jose Siri— Yankees Videos (@snyyankees)
Soto adds: "From this side, we always come out, play hard, and respect our teammates and the other teams too."
[pic.twitter.com/L8kIVD0sVO] [July 22, 2024]
Russo too went off on ‘First Take’ adding, “This is mind-boggling!” questioning how he even thought of celebrating when “they’re losing 5-0 at the time for crying out loud!” On the other hand, many supported Jose Siri saying baseball is a game to have fun, seeing no problem with his celebration.
In case you missed:

author: Redazione web
title: Fondaco dei Tedeschi verso la chiusura del 30 aprile, che fine faranno i 200 lavoratori? Tavolo in Regione, Ma
text:
VENEZIA - Si è tenuta oggi, 27 marzo, una riunione del tavolo regionale sulla situazione e sulla definizione delle prospettive per il Fondaco dei Tedeschi di Venezia. La data di chiusura del 30 aprile prevista per il negozio si avvicina.
«L'incontro di oggi aveva primariamente l'obiettivo di comprendere lo stato di avanzamento delle attività di ricollocamento previste dall'accordo di gennaio per i circa 200 lavoratori dipendenti di DFS Italia. In anticipo rispetto alla chiusura del negozio, - spiega l'assessore regionale al Lavoro Valeria Mantovan - prevista per il 30 aprile e alle attività di disallestimento che termineranno il 31 maggio, sono state già avviate le interviste e l'assessment per agevolare il ricollocamento di una parte dei lavoratori nelle aziende del gruppo LVMH. Parallelamente, è stata avviata un'attività che, per il tramite degli enti bilaterali, potrà facilitare il reinserimento in altre aziende del terziario e turistiche. Infine, è partita la progettazione per avviare i percorsi di politica attiva del lavoro messi a disposizione della Regione per orientare, formare e ricollocare i lavoratori».
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->corporate news and profiles

di politica attiva del lavoro messi

author: Solange Banchon
title: ¡Batacazo! Gabriel Leyes, ex Alianza Lima, volvió a Perú y firmó por impensado club: \
text:
¡Batacazo! Gabriel Leyes, ex Alianza Lima, volvió a Perú y firmó por impensado club: "Bienvenido"
El delantero uruguayo con pasado en Alianza Lima, Gabriel Leyes ha sido anunciado como el flamante fichaje de un equipo peruano y jugará la Liga 1 2025.
Únete a nuestro canal de WhatsApp
¡Sorpresa en la Liga 1 2025! Gabriel Leyes, delantero uruguayo que pasó por las filas de Alianza Lima está de regreso al Perú pues acaba de ser oficializado como la flamante contratación de un histórico club peruano.
PUEDES VER:
[¿Bomba en la Liga 1? Paolo Hurtado cerca de firmar por campeón peruano: "Negociaciones avanzadas"]
Deportivo Binacional hizo oficial el fichaje de Gabriel Leyes este 2025
Deportivo Binacional, que volverá a jugar en la máxima categoría del balompié nacional, luego de presentar una medida cautelar a la justicia ordinaria, confirmó la llegada del atacante extranjero para afrontar toda la temporada 2025. Cabe indicar que, la escuadra de Juliaca apunta a armar un amplio plantel y en esta ocasión, confiaron en su amplia trayectoria profesional.
"¡Bienvenido a la perla del altiplano! Los ganadores nunca renuncian y los que renuncian nunca ganan. ¡A darlo todo, Gabriel!", precisó el 'Poderoso del Sur', en su cuenta de 'X', antes Twitter.
Leyes arribará al conjunto de altura, procedente de Danubio FC de Uruguay donde estuvo en la última campaña. Con la 'Franja' el uruguayo tuvo buen ritmo futbolístico pues afrontó 33 partidos, además anotó 4 goles durante el 2024. El también campeón con Alianza Lima retornó a su país natal tras su etapa en Municipal de Guatemala desde mediados del 2023. Por su parte, ahora buscará seguir aportando toda su experiencia en el club que será liderado por Erick Torres.
Gabriel Leyes: ¿en qué clubes ha jugado?
- River Plate (Uruguay)
- Peñarol
- Juventud (Uruguay)
- Plaza Colonia (Uruguay)
- Alianza Lima
- Cerro Largo
- Academia Cantolao
- Carlos Stein
- C.S.D Municipal
- Danubio F.C
Gabriel Leyes: ¿cuál es su valor?
De acuerdo al prestigioso portal internacional Transfermarkt, especialista en el traspaso de futbolistas a nivel mundial, el delantero de 34 años se cotiza actualmente en 125 mil euros en el mercado de fichajes. Su precio más alto (400 mil euros) lo obtuvo en la temporada 2017 con Alianza Lima.
